{{ ejercicio.name }}

{{ ejercicio.description }}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { WgerService } from '../wger.service'; import { Observable, take, forkJoin} from 'rxjs'; import { map } from 'rxjs/operators'; @Component({ selector: 'app-ejercicios', templateUrl: './ejercicios.component.html', styleUrls: ['./ejercicios.component.scss'] }) export class EjerciciosComponent implements OnInit { ejercicios: any[] = []; imagenesEjercicios: {[ejercicioId: number]: any[]} = {}; constructor(private wgerservice: WgerService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.getEjercicios(); } getEjercicios(): void { this.wgerservice.getExercises().subscribe((response: any) => { this.ejercicios = response.results; this.ejercicios.forEach(ejercicio => { this.getImagesEjercicios(ejercicio.id); }); }); console.log(this.ejercicios); } getImagesEjercicios(id: number): void { this.wgerservice.getImagesEjercicios(id).subscribe((response: any) => { // Use filter() to get only the images for the current exercise const imagesForExercise = response.results.filter((imagen: any) => { return imagen.exercise === id; }); // Use shift() to remove all but the first image const firstImage = imagesForExercise.shift(); this.imagenesEjercicios[id] = [firstImage]; }); } }
